about_the_game:
This is a bonus item granted to those who have purchased the Digital Deluxe Edition.



"The Book of Death" contains detailed character artwork, concept art for Kanai Ward and Mystery Labyrinths, and more. Explore the world of Master Detective Archives: RAIN CODE in this digital artbook.

Contents
- Detailed character designs
- Concept art and storyboards
- Creator commentary

[Languages]
Interface: Japanese / Traditional Chinese / Simplified Chinese - Audio: Japanese / English

*This content is not sold separately.
*Digital artbook cannot be viewed in game. This is a separate application from the main game.
*Digital artbook contains spoilers and early concept art from Master Detective Archives: RAIN CODE Plus. It's recommended you view it after completing the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Core i3-8350K or AMD Ryzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)/Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Super, 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX 5600XT, 6 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: This is a bonus item granted to those who have purchased the Digital Deluxe Edition.
supported_languages:
Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
*languages with full audio support
